name: FireLight (Andrew Spinks)
description:
Hey Mates!

This is a game jam we did in year 2 class over a period of about 3 hours. Suffice to say, the game is. . . .well not good, lol. BUT it is pretty amazing just how much you can get done in that time!

I did the main design and programming for this Jam, James Porely helped with design and direction. Elise Vohradsky did the firefly and frog sprites.

C&C is of course welcome, despite the fact it is extremely unlikely that we will ever return to this project.

Cheers Mates!

Andrew.
